content:
Machine learning is a field of study that gives computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed. It’s a subset of artificial intelligence (AI) that focuses on building systems that learn from data and improve their performance over time.
Key Concepts # Supervised Learning: The algorithm is trained on labeled data. Unsupervised Learning: The algorithm is trained on unlabeled data and must find patterns on its own. Reinforcement Learning: The algorithm learns by interacting with its environment and receiving rewards or penalties. In this post, we’ll dive into each of these areas and explore some common algorithms used today.
title: [TEST] The Basics of Machine Learning

content: Welcome to my blog! Here you’ll find my thoughts and articles on data science, machine learning, and more.
title: Blog

content:
In this project, I developed an interactive dashboard to visualize global temperature trends over the last century.
Features # Interactive Maps: Explore temperature changes across different regions. Dynamic Charts: Filter data by year, country, or specific climate indicators. Data Insights: Automated summaries highlighting significant trends. Built using Python, Pandas, and Streamlit, this dashboard demonstrates the power of visual storytelling with data.
title: [TEST] Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
